snippet: Very few people seem to like Congress much these days. Those who do talk about why.
abstract: So-called sequestration may only add to unpopularity of what has become one of America’s most loathed political institutions: Congress; Americans give House and Senate just 12 percent approval rating in polls, up barely a little from its all-time low; still, one in eight Americans gives institution thumbs-up.
lead_paragraph: Very few people seem to like Congress much these days. Those who do talk about why.

headline.seo: Some Still Give Congress Good Marks
headline.main: Despite the Dysfunction, Congress Still Has Fans
headline.print_headline: Despite the Dysfunction, Congress Still Has Fans
